QuestData.Title: The Ritual of Binding
QuestData.Description: The time has come for you to undertake the Ritual of Binding, $n.$b$bThis ancient, shamanic rite has been practiced since long before I was born. To be chosen is a great honor.$b$bMany shaman see vivid elemental visions during the rite; experiencing this world through the very elemental bonds that hold it together.$b$bWhen you are ready, speak with Kalandrios to begin the rite.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Kalandrios to begin the Ritual of Binding.
QuestData.RewardText: <Farseer Drek'Thar listens closely as you speak of your vision.>$b$bI see... these are truly dark days. Cho'gall has invaded the heart of Oshu'gun, draining the naaru of its life. He seeks to destroy the naaru, birthing a dark, void god in its place.$b$bCho'gall must be stopped. Come, we must travel to the sacred mountain before it is too late.
